block_comment: This line of code assigns a value to the 'rj_data' based on the state of the 'rd_en' signal. If 'rd_en' is high (True/1), the data from the 'rj_mem' at the index location 'rj_rd_addr' will be assigned to 'rj_data'. If 'rd_en' is low (False/0), a default value of 16'b0 is assigned to 'rj_data'. This operation is instant and happens whenever the 'rd_en' or 'rj_rd_addr' changes.
